components.description:
A yellow face with soft, closed eyes, raised eyebrows, and a slight smile. Facebook’s design features a slightly open mouth, as if sighing.

Conveys various pleasant feelings, including contentment, calm, peace, and relief. May also convey feelings of happiness or good-natured humor more generally.

Google and Microsoft previously included sweat beads. Not to be confused with ðŸ˜” Pensive Face, which has similarly shaped eyes but in a sadder expression.
components.title: Relieved Face

description:

Conveys various pleasant feelings, including contentment, calm, peace, and relief. May also convey feelings of happiness or good-natured humor more generally.

Google and Microsoft previously included sweat beads. Not to be confused with ðŸ˜” Pensive Face, which has similarly shaped eyes but in a sadder expression.
title: Relieved Face

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: Pleasantly content. Happy, but not over the top.Â Feeling a sense of relief over aÂ situation, or to convey a calm or content state of mind. R http://emojipedia.org/relieved-face/
emoji_net_data.name: relieved face

bn:00100364a: Satisfied; in a state of satisfaction.
Satisfied or showing satisfaction with things as they are

bn:00098637a: Having a red face from embarrassment or shame or agitation or emotional upset
With a red face; flushed, due to emotional or physical causes.

bn:00108363a: Not at war or disturbed by strife or turmoil.
Not disturbed by strife or turmoil or war

bn:00086403v: Become less tense, rest, or take one's ease
To become less tense, rest, or take one's ease.
To become less severe or tense.

bn:00093934v: Change one's facial expression by spreading the lips, often to signal pleasure

bn:00090121v: Manually manipulate (someone's body), usually for medicinal or relaxation purposes

bn:00042905n: The emotion of being happy; joy.
Mental or emotional state of well-being characterized by pleasant emotions
Happiness is an emotional or affective state that is characterized by feelings of enjoyment and satisfaction.
Happiness is a mental or emotional state of well-being characterized by positive or pleasant emotions ranging from contentment to intense joy.
Emotions experienced when in a state of well-being.
Emotions experienced when in a state of well-being

bn:00032600n: Part of the body at the front of the head
The face is a central organ of sense and is also very central in the expression of emotion among humans and among numerous other species.
Faces are the central sense organ complexes, for those animals that have one, normally on the ventral surface of the head.
The front of the human head from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear
The front part of the head, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth and the surrounding area.

bn:00056811n: A period of time spent sleeping
